EmailTemplate.description: Applications open for 2015 NCS Grads, not applied to HS - Brum
EmailTemplate.name: C1:16 - App Email - Grads - BRUM
EmailTemplate.subject: Missing NCS? Applications for HeadStart are now OPEN!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello from HeadStart! ------------------------------------------------------------ It's been a whole year since you were on NCS with The Challenge, and we just wanted to let you know about another awesome opportunity!
HeadStart is an exclusive programme designed for NCS with The Challenge graduates!
Applications for our 2016 programme are now OPEN!
To find out more, check out our HeadStart animation! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z4y4AvgpLEk
https://www.headstart-thechallenge.org/confirm-email/ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z4y4AvgpLEk
** Any questions? Email us at headstart@the-challenge.org ------------------------------------------------------------ Want to get in on the conversation? Join our brand new national social media channels to see what's going on in HeadStart around the country! https://www.facebook.com/UKHeadStart/?fref=ts https://www.instagram.com/ukheadstart/ https://twitter.com/UKHeadStart http://www.headstart-thechallenge.org/ mailto:headstart@the-challenge.org
============================================================ Copyright Â© The Challenge, All rights reserved.
You are receiving this email because you took part in NCS with The Challenge.
